title: Surapong Sripirom
text: Surapong Sripirom (born 31 March 1949) is a Thai <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201972%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Light%20flyweight">men's light flyweight</a> event at the <a href="1972%20Summer%20Olympics">1972 Summer Olympics</a>.
